Name: Vavavoom
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine chilled
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Review: This drink does indeed give champagne that vavavoom.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2002 by Yannick Miseriaux at The Fifth Floor Bar, Harvey Nichols, London, England, and named after the Renault Car television advertisements.
Nutrition: One serving of Vavavoom contains 62 calories
